about_the_game:
MAGIX Movie Studio 2023 – For memories that last forever


Enjoy a revolutionary video editing experience thanks to intuitive tools, a simple operating concept, clearer project overview and automated workflows. Highlights include a wide range of editing tools, around 1,500 effects, transitions and titles, a high-speed timeline for smooth navigation and Intel Hyper Encode, which significantly reduces video export time.

As a result, you can quickly and easily create high-quality videos, whether for your YouTube channel or to capture vacation memories.

Experience double the power with Intel Hyper Encode, now included in the program, as well as the new high-speed timeline, intelligent search function, favorites filters, customizable content overview, astonishing NewBlue effects, and new travel route animations.

  • DISCOVERALL THE BENEFITS OF THE PLATINUM VERSION: With a wide range of editing tools including multicam editing for 4 cameras, detailed color correction, up to 1,500 effects, titles, templates & transitions, and automatic shot match.
  • EASY TO USE, FAST, PROFESSIONAL: Whether shot quickly with your cell phone or filmed professionally, turn your footage into stunning, high-quality movies in only a few minutes with Movie Studio.
  • EVERYTHING YOU NEED: With its wide range of cutting tools, the video editing program enables you to make each and every one of your ideas a reality – while benefiting from the latest technology. Work with detailed color correction, video stabilization and LUTs. The optimized high-speed timeline allows you to navigate projects smoothly and gives you full overview and control even of large amounts of material.
  • MAGIX TRAVEL MAPS: Create custom animations of your travel routes in seconds with this video editing software. Now with brand-new features like fly-in animations, filter view and GPX elevation profiles.
  • MADE IN GERMANY: Get the MAGIX video editing program, developed directly by the German manufacturer.
detailed_description:
MAGIX Movie Studio 2023 – For memories that last forever


Enjoy a revolutionary video editing experience thanks to intuitive tools, a simple operating concept, clearer project overview and automated workflows. Highlights include a wide range of editing tools, around 1,500 effects, transitions and titles, a high-speed timeline for smooth navigation and Intel Hyper Encode, which significantly reduces video export time.

As a result, you can quickly and easily create high-quality videos, whether for your YouTube channel or to capture vacation memories.

Experience double the power with Intel Hyper Encode, now included in the program, as well as the new high-speed timeline, intelligent search function, favorites filters, customizable content overview, astonishing NewBlue effects, and new travel route animations.

  • DISCOVERALL THE BENEFITS OF THE PLATINUM VERSION: With a wide range of editing tools including multicam editing for 4 cameras, detailed color correction, up to 1,500 effects, titles, templates & transitions, and automatic shot match.
  • EASY TO USE, FAST, PROFESSIONAL: Whether shot quickly with your cell phone or filmed professionally, turn your footage into stunning, high-quality movies in only a few minutes with Movie Studio.
  • EVERYTHING YOU NEED: With its wide range of cutting tools, the video editing program enables you to make each and every one of your ideas a reality – while benefiting from the latest technology. Work with detailed color correction, video stabilization and LUTs. The optimized high-speed timeline allows you to navigate projects smoothly and gives you full overview and control even of large amounts of material.
  • MAGIX TRAVEL MAPS: Create custom animations of your travel routes in seconds with this video editing software. Now with brand-new features like fly-in animations, filter view and GPX elevation profiles.
  • MADE IN GERMANY: Get the MAGIX video editing program, developed directly by the German manufacturer.

name: Movie Studio 2023 Platinum Steam Edition

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Movie Studio 2023 Platinum Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/ 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 6th generation Intel Core i-series or higher, AMD Ryzen or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 620 or higher with 4 GB, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050ti or higher with 4 GB, AMD Radeon RX470 or higher with 4 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection: Required for registering and validating the program, as well as for some program features. Supported import formats • Image: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIF, TGA, HEIF • Audio: AAC, MP3, OGG, WAV, WMA • Video: (DV-)AVI, MJPEG, MKV, MPEG-1/2/4 (HEVC/H.265*), MOV, WMV(HD) Supported export formats • Image: JPEG, BMP • Disc: DVD, Blu-ray Disc, AVCHD disc • Audio: MP3, WAV • Video: (DV-)AVI, MJPEG, MPEG 2/4 (HEVC/H.265*), WMV(HD)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ideal for anyone who needs simple, fast and professional video editing, whether beginner or advanced user: A range of helpful wizards in Movie Studio 2023 ensure fast results without any technical hurdles.
